name: scraparr
description: Scraparr is a self-hosted tool to scrape and sync metadata for media libraries. It integrates with Radarr/Sonarr and enriches content automatically.
features: Metadata scraping: Automatically fetches and updates metadata for movies and TV shows.
Radarr integration: Syncs with Radarr to enrich movie libraries with enhanced metadata.
Sonarr integration: Connects to Sonarr for TV series metadata enrichment and updates.
Multiple sources: Aggregates data from TMDB, TVDB, and other metadata providers.
Poster management: Downloads and organizes high-quality posters and artwork.
Batch processing: Processes entire libraries efficiently with configurable batch sizes.
Custom mappings: Override automatic matches with manual metadata assignments.
Scheduling: Runs metadata updates on configurable schedules to keep libraries current.
API access: Provides REST API for integration with custom scripts and workflows.
Duplicate detection: Identifies and resolves duplicate entries in media libraries.
Language support: Fetches metadata in multiple languages for international content.
Notification system: Sends alerts on completion, errors, or metadata conflicts.
